Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

finaly ive done my Duna-Sample-Return-Mission successfully

The idea of this mission came from the NASA/ESA MarsSampleReturn-Mission (MSR) planed for 2018/2020: wiki

Ive used some mods to realise a very small probe. The pod, the decouplers and the chutes was downsized (and the pod retextured) by myself also to fit into a very small probe.

I know, the conic tank is a bit cheaty because of the fuel-weight-ratio (500l at 0.9t) but u know now: i want a "very small probe"

So here the pics now: (description)

..oh, and yeah.. my probe got a hard groundcontact and lost her rocketmotor but at this point she dont need the motor to continue the mission

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/yczX0/embed"></iframe>

hope u enjoy the pics and get some ideas for your own missions

-acd
